Package net.kyori.adventure.text.event

Class HoverEvent<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kyori.adventure.text.event.HoverEvent<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentBuilderApplicable, HoverEventSource<V>, StyleBuilderApplicable, net.kyori.examination.Examinable
    public final class HoverEvent<V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.kyori.examination.Examinable, HoverEventSource<V>, StyleBuilderApplicable
    A hover event.

    A hover event displays a component when hovered over by a mouse on the client.

    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  HoverEvent.Action<V>
      An enumeration of hover event actions.
      static class  HoverEvent.ShowEntity
      The value of a show_entity hover event.
      static class  HoverEvent.ShowItem
      The value of a show_item hover event.

                                                                    @NotNull Key type,

        Creates a hover event that show information about an entity on hover.

        In the official Minecraft: Java Edition client, no information will be shown unless the "Advanced tooltips" debug option is enabled.

        Parameters:

        id - the id
        Returns:
        a ShowEntity

        Description copied from interface: HoverEventSource
